mapper.sql: sum(case when esd.store_type ='self' then (case when esd.trans_type='consume' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount,0) when esd.trans_type='refund' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount*-1,0) else 0 end) else 0 end) as selfConsumerAmountSum, sum(case when esd.store_type ='third' then (case when esd.trans_type='consume' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount,0) when esd.trans_type='refund' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount*-1,0) else 0 end) else 0 end) as thirdConsumerAmountSum, sum(case when esd.trans_type='consume' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount,0) when esd.trans_type='refund' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount*-1,0) else 0 end)as totalConsumerAmountSum
mapper.select:
select esd.account_code as accountCode, esd.account_name as accountName, a.phone as phone, d.department_name as departmentName, CONCAT(a.surplus_quota + a.surplus_quota_overpay, '/',a.max_quota) as quota, count(esd.trans_amount) as orderNum, sum(case when esd.store_type ='self' then (case when esd.trans_type='consume' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount,0) when esd.trans_type='refund' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount*-1,0) else 0 end) else 0 end) as selfConsumerAmount, sum(case when esd.store_type ='third' then (case when esd.trans_type='consume' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount,0) when esd.trans_type='refund' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount*-1,0) else 0 end) else 0 end) as thirdConsumerAmount, sum(case when esd.trans_type='consume' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount,0) when esd.trans_type='refund' then IFNULL(esd.trans_amount*-1,0) else 0 end)as totalConsumerAmount from employee_settle_detail esd left join account a on esd.account_code = a.account_code left join department d on a.store_code = d.department_code where esd.mer_code = #{query.merCode}
group by esd.account_code

select
from employee_settle_detail esd left join account a on esd.account_code = a.account_code left join department d on a.store_code = d.department_code where esd.mer_code = #{query.merCode}

select
from employee_settle_detail esd left join account a on esd.account_code = a.account_code left join department d on a.store_code = d.department_code where 1=1

select store_code storeCode, store_name storeName from employee_settle_detail where 1=1
and account_code=#{accountCode} and settle_flag='unsettled'
and settle_no=#{settleNo}
group by store_code
